SEARCH
Package com.app.service.impl

Class ProductServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.service.impl.ProductServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductService
@Component public class ProductServiceImpl extends Object implements ProductService
Implementation of the ProductService interface, providing methods to manage and analyze Product entities. This service interacts with a ProductRepositoryImpl to perform various operations on products.

  • Method Details

    • groupAndSortProducts

      public <T> Map<T,List<Product>> groupAndSortProducts(Function<Product,T> productMapper, Comparator<Product> comparator)
      Groups and sorts products based on a given mapping function and comparator.
      Specified by:
      groupAndSortProducts in interface ProductService
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the key for grouping
      Parameters:
      productMapper - a function to map products to their grouping key
      comparator - a comparator to sort the products within each group
      Returns:
      a map where the keys are derived from the productMapper, and the values are lists of sorted products
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if productMapper or comparator is null

    • getAllProducts

      public List<Product> getAllProducts()
      Retrieves a list of all products from the repository.
      Specified by:
      getAllProducts in interface ProductService
      Returns:
      a list containing all Product entities

    • getProductsStatistic

      Specified by:
      getProductsStatistic in interface ProductService
      Returns:
      a Statistic object containing the statistics for the products
